December 1980: The Tycoon's Exploit

Plays:

The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Scenes:

The Feast at Nijo Castle (二条城配膳)

The Myoshinji Temple (妙心寺)

The Melons Offered to Hisayoshi (瓜献上)

The Gourd Trellis (夕顔棚)

The Amagasaki Village (尼が崎)
